Answer the following questions, is there damage to the section, if so

{
    "Wind Damage": "0",
    "Hail Hits": "0"
}

InspectionStepFront - 'Are there visible damages to the front elevation?'
InspectionStepRight - 'Are there visible damages to the right elevation?'
InspectionStepRear - 'Are there visible damages to the rear elevation?'
InspectionStepLeft - 'Are there visible damages to the left elevation?'

Ability to add buildings to inspection
Name
Is Damaged
Description
and the appropriate Elevations

{
  "Is there damage to Left Elevation?": {
    "damaged": true,
    "description": "Hail damage to the downspouts"
  },
  "Is there damage to Rear Elevation?": {
    "damaged": true,
    "description": "Hail damage to one window"
  },
  "Is there damage to Front Elevation?": {
    "damaged": false,
    "description": null
  },
  "Is there damage to Right Elevation?": {
    "damaged": true,
    "description": "Hail damage to paint"
  }
}

https://wxdata.com

use the Storm Report Api

Pull in weather data for the city, state with the date range of $assignment->loss_date +- 10 days

Save whole response in the api status table
Create new table to hold per assignment table
Api response will return multiple reading locations, determine the closest reading location and store that data in the per assignments table

We need a method in which we are able to create assignments in bulk. This should be done via a csv upload.

Currently data is partially split between the assignments table and the xactimate_assignments table. Since these won't have data from xactimate, we would look into moving the columns from xactimate_assignments to assignments

On the User Management page add an option to bulk upload users. Utilize a similar design as the bulk upload of assignments.

System should loop through csv, extra the necessary data and create the users based on the role column in the csv. Skip admin role type.

Role will determine what fields are required for the user.

If there is an error display the row number and data, if the email already exists inform the user that the email was skipped because it exists.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1593027625932,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"GENERAL-9","entityId":"2-389","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"GENERAL"},{"name":"summary","value":"Revise the Claim Intake Form"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Kris Anolfo"},{"name":"created","value":"1593027206178"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"9"},{"name":"description","value":"

Fields on the Claim Intake Form need to be revised. Change all of the formatted fields to be single line or number fields so they can be integrated with Xact in the future.

In addition, make all fields required except for Mobile Phone and Email Address.

Add the following two questions as dropdown with Yes/No as responses. If Yes is selected for either question then an option to upload documentation needs to appear.

Are there any prior claims that should be considered on this loss?
Are there any policy endorsements that should be considered?
